DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate bioequivalence alendronate combination vitamin D ( cholecalciferol ) compare alendronate alone bioequivalence vitamin D combination alendronate compare vitamin D alone .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Bioequivalence 70 mg Alendronate 70 mg Alendronate Combination With 2800 IU Vitamin D
DOC.criteria: Male nonpregnant female age 18 65 year Female childbearing potential appropriate method contraception nursing BMI ( body mass index ) less equal 30 kg/m2 Subject good health Willing limit direct sunlight apply sunscreen sun 1 hour mental legal incapacitation receive bisphosphonate treatment within 3 month screen unable sit stand upright least 2 hour
